values.comment: Draw a card only when you have less than 3 cards, no minions on board and more than 12 effective health.
values.condition: my_hand(count()) < 3 AND my_minions(count()) < 2 AND (my_hero(count(), health) + my_hero(count(), armor)) > 12 AND my_discover(count(), cardid = LOOT_054d) > 0

values.comment: Give your minions +1 Attack only when you have more than a minion more than 12 effective health.
values.condition: my_minions(count()) > 1 AND (my_hero(count(), health) + my_hero(count(), armor)) > 12 AND my_discover(count(), cardid = LOOT_054b) > 0

values.comment: Gain 6 Armor only when you have less than 13 effective health.
values.condition: (my_hero(count(), health) + my_hero(count(), armor)) < 13 AND my_discover(count(), cardid = LOOT_054c) > 0
